title: 10 year anniversary Gifts while suspended
body: I recently have gotten suspended for toxic behavior in league about a week ago and I need one more week until I get unbanned. I wanted to know if I could still claim the 10 year anniversary gifts they're doing even if I'm still suspended. Correct me if I'm wrong but I think the gifts start on October 17 and I would really hate it if my suspension meant I couldn't get any of the gifts.

replies.body: No presents for the naughty kids
Hmm. I’d doubt you can get rewards. But try submitting a support ticket and ask them. __
But can you get them if your honor is locked? it says here all you have to do is log-in everyday to get them.

> [{quoted}](name=PERMABANNED KEKW,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7Gismpo0,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-10-16T15:56:50.737+0000)
>
> But can you get them if your honor is locked? it says here all you have to do is log-in everyday to get them.

No it's not a login reward.u must play one game each day to obtain the gifts.
That's what I'm saying, we should be able to get them but I guess because we got suspended we have to be punished. :(

So there is actually a page on the Support site that explains this: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/360036377774-Let-s-Celebrate-10-Years-of-League-

Basically, the first 10 days will *unlock* the missions (one for each day), which will then remain available until 19th November, so you should definitely be able to pick up the rewards for them once your suspension has ended.

And why does this info on a site for support?
This is important and I do not understand why this is not part of the NEWS part of the site.

I was genuinely trying to test out their system and it worked, I was surprised I got suspended because my friend has been trying for months and has only gotten chat restricted (he has said worse things than what I said). Either way what you're saying is that I wont be getting those rewards then?

> [{quoted}](name=doujinshiii,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7Gismpo0,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2019-10-16T04:29:09.136+0000)
>
> I was genuinely trying to test out their system and it worked, I was surprised I got suspended because my friend has been trying for months and has only gotten chat restricted (he has said worse things than what I said). Either way what you're saying is that I wont be getting those rewards then?

Why would you test it on your main and not a smurf?
On a smurf you get forgiven too easily most of the time. On an already experienced account that "knows" the rules should get suspended easier.

> [{quoted}](name=doujinshiii,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7Gismpo0,comment-id=0000000100020000,timestamp=2019-10-16T18:00:58.327+0000)
>
> On a smurf you get forgiven too easily most of the time. On an already experienced account that "knows" the rules should get suspended easier.

Yeah no you don't. All accounts are treated the same.

ive tried harder on a new account and almost nothing happens to it. i got a chat restrict once but it didnt prove me anything. probably cause the only low level players are smurfs trying to rank up their account and really dont give a shit.

> [{quoted}](name=doujinshiii,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7Gismpo0,comment-id=000000010002000000000000,timestamp=2019-10-23T20:20:11.383+0000)
>
> ive tried harder on a new account and almost nothing happens to it. i got a chat restrict once but it didnt prove me anything. probably cause the only low level players are smurfs trying to rank up their account and really dont give a shit.

Sounds like it's not more forgiving, it's just less people reporting. Same thing as challenger, people rarely report and toxic players take a long time to be banned.

talk about timing
unlucky fren
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
I still get them even after being chat banned right?
If you mean a chat restriction I'm pretty sure you still get them, in my case I'm fully suspended and cant play any games or talk with teammates.
Hey thats pretty toxic. you should be banned.
I have the same problem too :( A friend of mine got me banned and yeah.... It sucks
[reddit post](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/dimn55/league_of_legends_11_rewards_starting_1710_to_2710/?utm_source=share&utm_medium=ios_app&utm_name=iossmf)

> [{quoted}](name=doujinshiii,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7Gismpo0,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-10-16T04:14:27.625+0000)
>
> I recently have gotten suspended for toxic behavior in league about a week ago and I need one more week until I get unbanned. I wanted to know if I could still claim the 10 year anniversary gifts they're doing even if I'm still suspended. Correct me if I'm wrong but I think the gifts start on October 17 and I would really hate it if my suspension meant I couldn't get any of the gifts.
If you read the discussion detailing it on Surrender at 20, it explicitly states that the rewards will be obtainable for a time after their dates.
I Got suspended like 3 months ago,but still have 2 checkpoints and i'm at honor 0. Will i take the rewards from event?I can play/talk in games so idk if that honor0 affects the rewards

im pretty sure you're alright. plus the suspension should be sort of "cleared" because within 3 months after the issued suspension you cant do any other offense or you'll get perma'd. since it's been 3 months for you, you're earning honor and basically you can still get the anniversary cause all you gotta do is log in

the sad truth is and its what i've come to terms with is you just cant type a single thing anymore and just either be like a robot and dont type or just use voice comms if you have a mic.. I know how heated it can get but riot dont care about context or anything.. just /mute all and play the game... people dont realise that being toxic and banter etc is part of life, people just like to be able to control others on a game because they have no control in their own life.. just remember that :p{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Are u permabanned? Or just 14 days ban
14 day ban. I mean it says all we gotta do is log in and I can still log into my account, I just really cant do anything.
